price: 88. (Nabigu) wuxuu yidhi: Rabbiyow! kuwaanu waa qolo aan rumayneyn (Xaqa).
arabic: وَقِيلِهِۦ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqīlihi yārabbi inna hāulāi qawmun lā yu'minūna
